sentences.sContent: The excreta of humans and land animals contain soluble refractory organic matter.
sentences.sContent_eng: The excreta of humans and land animals contain soluble refractory organic matter.
sentences.sCn: 人和陆生动物排泄物含有可溶的难处理有机物质。

sentences.sContent: If the quality of food eaten is good, then the excreta is comparitively easier to tolerate.
sentences.sContent_eng: If the quality of food eaten is good, then the excreta is comparitively easier to tolerate.
sentences.sCn: 如果吃的是优质食物，那么排泄物就相对容易忍受。

sentences.sContent: Nitrogen turnover from grazing livestock excreta is the key process in the nitrogen cycle of pasture ecosystems.
sentences.sContent_eng: Nitrogen turnover from grazing livestock excreta is the key process in the nitrogen cycle of pasture ecosystems.
sentences.sCn: 放牧家畜排泄物氮转化是草原生态系统氮循环的关键。

words.tran: 排泄的，分泌的；有排泄功能的
排泄，排泄物；分泌，分泌物

trans.tranOther: the solid or liquid waste material that people and animals produce and get rid of from their bodies
